Fixes # (issue)


## Before submitting
- [ ] This PR fixes a typo or improves the docs (you can dismiss the other checks if that's the case).
- [ ] Did you read the [contributor guideline](https://github.com/simonreise/remote-sensing-processor/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md#create-a-pull-request), Pull Request section?
- [ ] Was this discussed/approved via a GitHub issue? Please add a link to it if that's the case.
- [ ] Did you make sure to update the documentation with your changes? If your PR adds anything to the public API, please make sure to add a [numpy-style docstring](https://numpydoc.readthedocs.io/en/latest/format.html) to it.
- [ ] Did you write any new necessary tests?


## Who can review?

Anyone in the community is free to review the PR once the tests have passed. Feel free to tag members/contributors who may be interested in your PR.
